Dynamic crypto-art edition alternating between two animated .gif artworks, triggered reactively by The Rise and Fall of ETH price.  

A new, liminal SisyphusÎ, one who has escaped the eternal sentence of The Gods and found a way into his own world; by casting down the prescribed, accursed rock and taking instead The Moon into his hands and rolling onâ€¦  

From 23.April.23 onwards, this token may be burned-to-claim a handmade edition of either The Rise or The Fall; whichever artwork is displayed at the time of burn. Delivered with the novel Ermis protocol from Ä’nosys - secure in total wallet anonymity and fully encrypted on-chain.
